content: the multi-pocket crochet tote organizer is the perfect thing to keep your tote bag organized and make your life easier or add it to a walker or other assistive mobility device for extra pockets the pattern for the multi-pocket crochet tote organizer is just about as easy as it gets simple row of double_crochet are folded and seamed… et voila easy as can be and for more experienced crocheters this pattern is perfect for fun customizations add or subtract stripes add a fun stitch pattern to the front pockets and divide the pockets however you like depending on what you like to tote around extra materials needed 2 stitch markers four 15mm buttons coats® all-purpose™ sewing thread tapestry needle sewing needle
